# 其它

## 1.java web 容器

```
tomcat:
	http://tomcat.apache.org/
jetty:
	http://www.eclipse.org/jetty/
```

## 2.subclipse(eclipseSVN插件)

```
下载官网:
http://subclipse.tigris.org/

移动到下面位置
https://github.com/subclipse
https://github.com/subclipse/subclipse/wiki

老的SVN 1.9X已经不再更新
SVN 1.9.x - https://dl.bintray.com/subclipse/archive/release/1.12.x/(目前eclipse安装没问题的)
SVN 1.8.x - https://dl.bintray.com/subclipse/archive/release/1.10.x/
SVN 1.7.x - https://dl.bintray.com/subclipse/archive/release/1.8.x/

网上的：
Links for 1.8.x Release: 
Eclipse update site URL: http://subclipse.tigris.org/update_1.8.x(验证安装)
svn插件包下载: http://subclipse.tigris.org/servlets/ProjectDocumentList?folderID=2240 
Links for 1.6.x Release: 
Eclipse update site URL: http://subclipse.tigris.org/update_1.6.x 
svn插件包下载: http://subclipse.tigris.org/servlets/ProjectDocumentList?folderID=2240 
Links for 1.4.x Release: 
Eclipse update site URL: http://subclipse.tigris.org/update_1.4.x 
svn插件包下载: http://subclipse.tigris.org/servlets/ProjectDocumentList?folderID=2240 

新的subclipse安装方法
Latest - https://dl.bintray.com/subclipse/releases/subclipse/latest/
4.2.x - https://dl.bintray.com/subclipse/releases/subclipse/4.2.x/

eclipse安装方法
eclipse>help>install new software>add输入上面的地址在线安装

myeclipse安装方法
在myclipse安装目录dropins目录下新建SVN目录，把插件features,plugins目录文件copy过去重启myeclipse即可
```

## 3.WindowBuilder

```
1.WB_v1.6.1_UpdateSite_for_Eclipse4.3（java GUI开发工具，直接copy里面的jar到eclipse features,plugins）

进入www.eclipse.org,到PROJECTS搜索WindowBuilder插件,找到update site链接地址.
update site:http://download.eclipse.org/windowbuilder/WB/release/R201506241200-1/4.5/

打开eclipse>help>install new software(把地址复制进去进行安装)
```
